verses.text_plain: My breath is corrupt, my days are extinct, the graves are ready for me.
verses.verse_html:
1My breath is corrupt, my days are extinct, the graves are ready for me. ▼
▼ breath…: or, spirit is spent

footnotes.body_html: ▼ breath…: or, spirit is spent

verses.text_plain: Are there not mockers with me? and doth not mine eye continue in their provocation?
verses.verse_html:
2Are there not mockers with me? and doth not mine eye continue in their provocation? ▼
▼ continue: Heb. lodge

tokens.text: with me? and doth not mine eye

verses.text_plain: Lay down now, put me in a surety with thee; who is he that will strike hands with me?
verses.verse_html: 3Lay down now, put me in a surety with thee; who is he that will strike hands with me?

tokens.text: now, put me in a surety

verses.text_plain: For thou hast hid their heart from understanding: therefore shalt thou not exalt them.
verses.verse_html: 4For thou hast hid their heart from understanding: therefore shalt thou not exalt them.

verses.text_plain: He that speaketh flattery to his friends, even the eyes of his children shall fail.
verses.verse_html: 5He that speaketh flattery to his friends, even the eyes of his children shall fail.

verses.text_plain: He hath made me also a byword of the people; and aforetime I was as a tabret.
verses.verse_html:
6He hath made me also a byword of the people; and aforetime I was as a tabret. ▼
▼ aforetime: or, before them

footnotes.body_html: ▼ aforetime: or, before them

verses.text_plain: Mine eye also is dim by reason of sorrow, and all my members are as a shadow.
verses.verse_html:
7Mine eye also is dim by reason of sorrow, and all my members are as a shadow. ▼
▼ my members: or, my thoughts

footnotes.body_html: ▼ my members: or, my thoughts

verses.text_plain: Upright men shall be astonied at this, and the innocent shall stir up himself against the hypocrite.
verses.verse_html: 8Upright men shall be astonied at this, and the innocent shall stir up himself against the hypocrite.

verses.text_plain: The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger.
verses.verse_html:
9The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger. ▼
▼ be…: Heb. add strength

footnotes.body_html: ▼ be…: Heb. add strength

verses.text_plain: But as for you all, do ye return, and come now: for I cannot find one wise man among you.
verses.verse_html: 10But as for you all, do ye return, and come now: for I cannot find one wise man among you.

tokens.text: as for you all, do ye return

verses.text_plain: My days are past, my purposes are broken off, even the thoughts of my heart.
verses.verse_html:
11My days are past, my purposes are broken off, even the thoughts of my heart. ▼
▼ the thoughts: Heb. the possessions

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the thoughts: Heb. the possessions

verses.text_plain: They change the night into day: the light is short because of darkness.
verses.verse_html:
12They change the night into day: the light is short because of darkness. ▼
▼ short: Heb. near

verses.text_plain: If I wait, the grave is mine house: I have made my bed in the darkness.
verses.verse_html: 13If I wait, the grave is mine house: I have made my bed in the darkness.

verses.text_plain: I have said to corruption, Thou art my father: to the worm, Thou art my mother, and my sister.
verses.verse_html:
14I have said to corruption, Thou art my father: to the worm, Thou art my mother, and my sister. ▼
▼ said: Heb. cried, or, called

footnotes.body_html: ▼ said: Heb. cried, or, called

verses.text_plain: And where is now my hope? as for my hope, who shall see it?
verses.verse_html: 15And where is now my hope? as for my hope, who shall see it?

verses.text_plain: They shall go down to the bars of the pit, when our rest together is in the dust.
verses.verse_html: 16They shall go down to the bars of the pit, when our rest together is in the dust.
